tool_description: Parses policy documents to extract structured coverage information including limits, deductibles, and covered perils.

policy_content.description: Full text content of the policy document

include_definitions.description: Whether to include policy definitions section

error_messages: Policy content empty: Policy document content cannot be empty. Provide valid policy text.
Unsupported policy type: Policy type not recognized. Use standard policy types (auto, home, commercial, liability, etc.).
Parsing failed: Unable to extract coverage information from policy document. Check document format and completeness.
Invalid parsing rules: One or more parsing rules are not supported. Use standard parsing rule names.
Coverage sections not found: Specified coverage sections do not exist in the policy document.
usage: Provide policy_content and policy_type to extract structured coverage data. Optionally specify parsing_rules and coverage_sections for targeted extraction. Returns organized coverage information ready for analysis.

coverage_limits.description: List of coverage limits by type

covered_perils.description: List of covered risks and perils
